title: 3 - The Worlds Worst Sinner
description:
In this week's episode we talk about Adele's new song, "Hello", porn (though not at the same time), and with our best judgement, how best to judge the judgers.

- Mike Erre

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com
